A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I have to admit that this was the first SW movie I was going to walk out on.
The plot was a mess. And generally just lame. I mean\, the core plot involved having a crippled rebel cruiser limp across space being poked by of big empire ship. Yawn.
Some scenes were just ridiculous. So I think bb8 is great\, but now that he can hijack and control an imperial walker he definitely will have his own spin off series (vs bb9 - who I though had racial undertone).
Some more bad things: Leia superman scene (nuking the fridge)\, Leia recovering in a day or so\, non funny humour\, casino world so pointless\, Snoke character development non-existent\, fish housekeepers on Luke's island\, Yoda mentions "page turner"\, Ben solo topless talking to rey\, Luke's legend destroyed. Oh I could go on.
